Articles.Content:
A while back I had some thing strange happen. In older versions I could launch off Minmus with just the reaction jets. Some thing odd happened when I tried this in .25. It's like it thought I was still landed on the surface. Even though I was clearly in orbit It said that I was still moving on the surface and would not let me save the game or return to the space center while I was "Moving over the surface".

Was this just a glitch or has some thing changed? By the way I don't like this.

Lee
Sounds like a glitch. How high was your PE and what was your orbital speed?

This was a while back so I don't recall the details. I was clearly in orbit. I want to say about 15,000 m. More or less circler.

Lee

I had some similar glitch in 0.25... where I was flying an attempt at an SSTO through the atmosphere, but it said I was landed/moving over the ground...

I haven't had it since, I don't know what caused it or if the cause has been fixed... why are we talking about 0.25 glitches anyway?
